message.content:
cs.ET, cs.NE, cs.AR, cs.CV, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.ET (Emerging Technologies): The paper proposes a framework to scale Neuromorphic Computing Systems (NCS) designs to big neural networks, which can be considered an emerging technology in the field of computing.
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper focuses on Neuromorphic Computing Systems (NCS) and proposes a method to optimize the design of crossbars in NCS for large neural networks.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper proposes a framework to optimize the hardware architecture of Neuromorphic Computing Systems (NCS) for large neural networks.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper tests the proposed framework on convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for image classification tasks, which falls under the category of computer vision and pattern recognition.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a framework to optimize the system design of Neuromorphic Computing Systems (NCS) for large neural networks.
